name: Dodgem (wouterXD)
description:
Dodgem is a little arcade game in wich you need to lead the following enemies into exploding each other!

Explanation:

Enemies will come from the sides of the screen to follow you. And when they hit you you lose hp, you need to try and manouvre around them to make them explode each other by touching. 

You also have a multiplyer bonus, you will see a bar going down once you have gotten a point and if you get another point the multiplyer will go up and the points you get will be multiplied by the number next to the timer.

The website will also keep track of your highest score so you will never lose that amazing score!

Controls:

You move with the WASD keys.

You can also introduce a 2nd player by pressing the / key.

The 2nd player can be controlled with the arrow keys.

If you lose you can press R to refresh the page and try again!

I am really happy with this game and i hope you do to!
